RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: INCOME REFLECTED IN COLUMN E REPRESENTS INTEREST INCOME FROM STATE AND LOCAL BONDS FROM PASS THROUGH ENTITIES WHICH IS EXCLUDED FROM TAX PURSUANT TO SECTION 103 OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE.
INCOME/(LOSS) OF ($23,271,373) REFLECTED IN COLUMN B IS NET OF ORDINARY LOSS OF ($57,131,701) AND CAPITAL GAIN OF $33,860,328 UNRELATED BUSINESS TAXABLE INCOME.

DistributionFromCorpusElection.ElectionDesc: AS TO THE TREATMENT OF QUALIFYING DISTRIBUTIONS PURSUANT TO IRC SEC. 4942(H)(2) AND REG. 53.4942(A)-3(D)(2), THE BLOOMBERG FAMILY FOUNDATION INC. HEREBY ELECTS TO TREAT $4,179,000 OF TOTAL CURRENT YEAR QUALIFYING DISTRIBUTIONS IN EXCESS OF THE IMMEDIATELY PRECEDING TAX YEAR'S UNDISTRIBUTED INCOME AS BEING MADE OUT OF CORPUS.SIGNED: DATE:NAME AND TITLE: MICHAEL R. BLOOMBERG, AUTHORIZED SIGNER

ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SUPPORT AIMS AND OBJECTIVES OF THE BLOOMBERG PHILANTHROPIES PUBLIC HEALTH PROGRAM; THE ORIGINAL GRANT DATED 11/13/15 WAS AMENDED ON 1/31/19 AND 10/5/20; $1,689,884 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/19. AMENDED ON 01/01/2021 EXTENDING GRANT TO 12/31/2022.DATES OF REPORTS BY GRANTEE:2/28/16 8/31/16 2/28/17 9/15/17 12/31/17 2/15/19 9/15/19 1/31/20 10/31/20 2/15/21
TO PROMOTE ROAD SAFETY IN LOW AND MIDDLE - INCOME COUNTRIES; THE ORIGINAL GRANT DATED 09/01/17 WAS AMENDED ON 05/01/18 AND 12/15/18; $1,645,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/19.

A LOAN FOR PORTABLE SOLAR LIGHTING AND POWER PRODUCTS FOR OFF-GRID CONSUMERS. $4,000,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/16. THE ORIGINAL LOAN DATED 04/01/14 WAS SUBSEQUENTLY AMENDED ON 5/29/15, 10/04/17 AND 08/23/2019 WHEREAS THE LAST AMENDMENT EXTENDED THE REPAYMENT TERM TO 12/31/2025. IN 2018, AN ALLOWANCE OF $3,874,385 WAS APPLIED BASED ON AN ASSESSMENT OF LOAN COLLECTABILITY.
A GRANT TO PROVIDE SOLAR LIGHTING TO OFF-GRID COMMUNITIES IN AFRICA. THE ORIGINAL GRANT DATED 07/01/17 WAS AMENDED ON 12/01/17; $500,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/19.
CAREER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION; $4,811,243 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/19. AMENDED ON 09/09/2021 EXTENDING GRANT TO 06/30/2021 AND RECOGNIZING THAT ENTITY NOW HAS PUBLIC CHARITY STATUS.

TO STRENGTHEN SMALL AND MID SIZED ARTS ORGANIZATIONS; $4,441,160 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/19. THE ORIGINAL GRANT DATED 03/01/18 WAS AMENDED ON 08/31/2020 REDUCING THE GRANT AMOUNT FROM $9,589,000 TO $6,665,000 AND REDUCED GRANT TERM FROM 04/30/2022 TO 08/31/2020.
TO CREATE ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITY FOR WOMEN IN RWANDA AND THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF CONGO. $280,401 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/2019.

TO SUPPORT CONSERVATION OF CORAL REEFS. THIS IS AN EARMARKED EXPENDITURE RESPONSIBILITY SUBGRANT THROUGH THE UNIVERSITY OF QUEENSLAND; $360,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/19. THE ORIGINAL GRANT DATED 01/01/17 WAS AMENDED ON 09/18/19 EXTENDING GRANT TO 04/30/2020.
TO SUPPORT ALS RESEARCH $10,000,000 WAS EXPENDED THROUGH 12/31/19.

GeneralExplanationGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990-PF, PAGE 1, LINE 6A COLUMN (A) AND LINE 6B
GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: GROSS SALES PRICE FOR ALL ASSETS ON LINE 6A AS REPORTED ON LINE 6B OF $0 INCLUDE ONLY DIRECT SALES OF ASSETS OWNED BY THE BLOOMBERG FAMILY FOUNDATION INC. NET GAIN FROM SALES ON ASSETS OF $407,600,133 AS REPORTED ONLINE 6A COLUMN (A) INCLUDES PASS THRU GAINS AS FOLLOWS: THRU PARTNERSHIP INVESTMENTS TOTAL REPORTED ON LINE 6A COLUMN (A) 407,600,133.SINCE THE PASS THRU ENTITIES DO NOT REPORT ALLOCABLE SALES PROCEEDS, LINE 6B DOES NOT INCLUDE ANY ALLOCABLE SHARE OF GROSS PROCEEDS FROM THE SALES THAT GENERATED FLOW THRU GAINS REPORTED ON LINE 6A.

LINE 3A - GRANTS AND CONTRIBUTIONS PAID DURING THE YEARTHE FOLLOWING ORGANIZATIONS ARE EARMARKED SUB-GRANTEES FROMI) ACADEMY FOUNDATION ACADEMY MUSEUM FOUNDATION 1,177,000. PURPOSE: PROGRAMMATIC SUPPORT
